TopicTitle: FAR is not adding any drag *FIXED*

Articles.Content:
FAR on my install doesn't make vessels slow in atmosphere. I have Realism Overhaul installed using CKAN

(Notice it's at orbital speed at 40km, and FAR doesn't show any drag or lift.)

Drag and lift work properly only with wings and control surfaces.

output_log.txt

*FIXED* - Seems to be a problem with CKAN version of FAR, as this one from original post works perfectly.

Edited December 23, 2015 by PatPL1
Installed GitHub version, and drag is now properly applied.
